function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of virus transmission through people-to-people contact in healthcare settings.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and potential infection of healthcare professionals.","Mitigation":"Use of autonomous vehicles for delivering essential goods and disinfecting hospitals.","Technologies":"Autonomous vehicles, self-driving cars, IoT, AI.","People":"Healthcare professionals, doctors, nurses, staff.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, technology companies."},{"Description":"Possible data security and privacy risks associated with IoT sensors collecting patient data.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to patient data leading to privacy breaches and misuse of sensitive information.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust data security measures, encryption of patient data, and compliance with data privacy regulations.","Technologies":"IoT, data encryption, data security protocols.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, data security experts.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, data security firms, government regulators."},{"Description":"Potential risk of misdiagnosis and reliance on AI for disease monitoring and decision-making.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of patient data leading to incorrect disease management and treatment decisions.","Mitigation":"Validation of AI algorithms, continuous human oversight of AI-generated conclusions, and collaboration between AI and healthcare professionals.","Technologies":"AI, machine learning, continuous validation protocols.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, AI experts.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, AI research institutions, medical professionals."}]}
